channel.title: Why I think Mopar should expand -
channel.description: I think that MoparScape shouldn't be limited to just RuneScape Private Servers. If they allowed other servers then I believe it would become way more popular. Yes I still think that RuneScape Private Servers should still be their main focus, but why not allow other types of servers? I have a MegaMan Battle Network 6 Server that allows others to make their own perfectly coded server or play on the main server. There are private servers ranging from RuneScape to WoW, Tibia, GBA Roms, MMORPG Engins, and countless others. What do you guys think?

item.title: Why I think Mopar should expand -
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

I don’t understand why you would want to change from the original point of the website?

This website is obviously used for Runescape private servers, so why change the point of having it only as a RSPS site?

I think it’s fine the way it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Why I think Mopar should expand -
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

As previously said, you have to realize that Moparisthebest originally created the Moparisthebest forum as a resort for members and staff from Kaitnieks after it shut down. The reason MoparScape was created was to generally remove the idiots asking about RuneScape server emulation from the other side of the forum.

Read full topic
